name: Brother (GameDevShark)
description:
Brother is a game I made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1. It is a heartfelt puzzler which tells a story of a boy being guided by his sister out of his self-forged cage of depression, anxiety, and fear.

Controls - Arrow keys to move, or use the D-Pad on a controller.

The theme for this jam was: It is not real. My game fits this theme through it's narrative and setting. You play in the boys mind, trying to escape his self-forged cage of depression, anxiety, and fear. This cage is not real, and is instead a trap of his own mental creation.
